GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.22 to before v4.19.256
GSD.description:
video: fbdev: vt8623fb: Check the size of screen before memset_io()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.256 by commit 52ad9bfeb8a0e62de30de6d39e8a49a72dd78150, it was introduced in version v2.6.22 by commit 558b7bd86c32978648cda5deb5c758d77ef0c165. For more details please see the references link.
